name: MKMultiPolyline
desc: A collection of multipolyline shapes, each consisting of one or more connected line segments.

items.name: init([MKPolyline])
items.desc: Create a multipolyline object using the provided polylines.

items.name: var polylines: [MKPolyline]
items.desc: An array containing the polyline objects that make up the multipolyline object.
